701860f-a.title: Bronx: Starlight Amusement Park.
701860f-a.text:
Starlight Amusement Park (Bronx): Viewing east across the Bronx
River and the park's swimming pool.
P. L. Sperr  July 23, 1940
NO PEPPODUCTIONS

701861f-c.title: Bronx: Starlight Amusement Park.
701861f-c.text:
Starlight Amusement Park (Bronx): The south end
of the park showing the swimming pool and reservoir, seen from
the E. 174th Street bridge over the Bronx River. The entrance
to the park is on the south side of E. 177th Street, at Devoe
Avende.
July 116, 1928
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
